law.catch_line: Costs of administration -- Use of money and property awarded to division as costs or fines.
law.text: All costs of administration and operation of the division shall be borne by the Department of Insurance. Any money or other property that is awarded to the division as costs of investigation or as a fine shall be credited to the Department of Insurance, and the money shall be used to help finance the division.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1589, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 253, sec. 8, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 23, effective July 15, 1994.
